Kyle, did you get the below post from Yanshosh yet? Yahoo groups is 
slow at times with sending mail. Especially to hotmail at times and 
definately AOL all the time. Heh I havent recieved the below post by 
yan yet either. Thats why I check the group. Woot mesa got yelled at 
in the post too... woot.


Well heres the post:From:  Yanshosh@a...
Date:  Sat Jul 21, 2001  2:28 am
Subject:  End The !@#%ing OOCs

 
THAT IS ENOUGH!

Out of the last 100+ posts, barely _10_ of them were IC. This is an 
RPG board,
not a general discussion board. If you want to discus something, do 
it over
private email or on the message board on the site.

I don't know about other people, but I am sick as hell of the 
completely
pointless OOCs on the RPG board. Lurker, you're a great RPer. Now 
shut up and
take the compliment. Dewey, this is a BW RPG. The moment I see a char 
with even
a variation of "Goku" as his name, you'll regret it. In adition, stop 
moding.
You can't make other people's chars do things, you never posted for 
Mustex even
attempting to get on Alliance Island, much less getting on it, you 
have no part
in the past of NBW, and can't change it at will. Your chars have no 
logical way
of knowing about Zardus or Veratis, and its moding to have them have 
that
insight. Either explain how they know or drop that storyline. It 
makes no
sence. Also, you never even landed that lowlife seller or whatever of 
yours on
the planet, and I'm not going to write your profiles for you. Shape 
up. Read
the rules and act by them. LegendaryNemasis, please stop commenting 
on every
post. The council will catch it if its moding.

Everyone else: stop the OOCs. Either write RPG posts, or don't post 
at all. I'm
very sick of coming home from work and reading through 100 or so damn 
OOC
posts. I'm about ready to moderate anyone who sends an OOC ever 
again. I won't,
but keep in mind that I'm on the verge of turning into a very mean 
person.

From now on, use private email for pointless OOCs, or use the site's 
message
board. DO NOT clog up space on this board. I'm sick of it, as I said 
like 10
times already in this post.

There. I'm through with my ranting. I really hope the OOC messages 
stop. Its
very hard for me to keep up with posts as it is, and all this 
pointless crap is
starting to convince me not to even bother.
